reaction.name: Boon of Tiamat (3/Day)
entries: The dracotaur grants a + {@hit 5} bonus to an attack roll made by an allied creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The dracotaur can make this choice after the roll is made but before it hits or misses. If the attack hits, it deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) energy damage of the type chosen by the dracotaur (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison).

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dracotaur casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit withspell attacks):

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the dracotaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its Greataxe on the same turn, the target takes an extra 6 ({@damage 1d12}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Marshal Allies
entries: Unless the dracotaur is {@condition incapacitated}, it and creatures of its choice within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dracotaur makes three melee attacks: one with its Greataxe or Javelin, one with its Bite, and one with its Tail.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spit Fire {@recharge 6}
entries: The dracotaur spits fire at a point within 30 feet of it. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 7d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: War Cry (1/Day)
entries: Each creature of the dracotaur's choice that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by War Cry gain advantage on attack rolls until the start of the dracotaur's next turn. All other creatures within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by War Cry must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of the dracotaur's next turn. The dracotaur can then make one attack as a bonus action.

reaction.name: Directed Strike (3/Day)
entries: When a creature the dracotaur can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll, and the creature can hear the dracotaur, the dracotaur grants advantage to that roll.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The dracotaur moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The dracotaur makes a melee or ranged attack.

legendary.name: Tactical Command
entries: The dracotaur targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the dracotaur, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack, move up to its speed, or move up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the dracotaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its Greataxe on the same turn, the target takes an extra 6 ({@damage 1d12}) slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dracotaur makes three melee attacks: one with its Greatsword, one with its Bite, and one with its Tail.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage, or 16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) slashing damage while raging.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage, or 13 ({@damage 1d8 + 9}) while raging.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, or 12 ({@damage 1d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage while raging, plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spit Fire {@recharge 6}
entries: The dracotaur spits fire at a point within 30 feet of it. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Tiamat's Breath (1/Day)
entries: The dracotaur chooses an energy type from acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. The dracotaur exhales energy of the chosen type in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) damage of the chosen damage type on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Rage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The dracotaur enters a rage. The rage lasts for 1 minute or until the dracotaur is {@condition incapacitated}. While raging, the dracotaur gains the following benefits.

items: The dracotaur has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
When it makes a melee weapon attack, the dracotaur gains a {@hit 4} bonus to the damage roll (included in the attack).
The dracotaur has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The dracotaur moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Frightful Glare
entries: The dracotaur turns its gaze toward one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to dracotaur's Frightful Glare for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dracotaur makes a melee or ranged attack.

legendary.name: Tail Sweep (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The dracotaur swings its tail, and every creature within 10 feet of it must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, or 12 ({@damage 1d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage while raging, plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the dracotaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its Pike on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the dracotaur can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dracotaur makes three melee attacks: one with its Greataxe or Javelin, one with its Bite, and one with its Tail.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) косой урон.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) колющего урона.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов или дальность 30/120 футов, одна цель. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) колющего урона.

action.name: Spit Fire {@recharge 6}
entries: The dracotaur spits fire at a point within 30 feet of it. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Retaliation
entries: When the dracotaur takes damage from a creature within 5 feet of it, the dracotaur can make one melee weapon attack against the creature.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the dracotaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its Pike on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dracotaur makes three melee attacks: one with its Pike, one with its Bite, and one with its Tail; or it can make two Longbow attacks.

action.name: Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Spit Fire {@recharge 6}
entries: The dracotaur spits fire at a point within 30 feet of it. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the dracotaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its Pike on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dracotaur makes three melee attacks: one with its Pike or Javelin, one with its Bite, and one with its Tail.

action.name: Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} попадание, радиус действия 10 футов, одна цель. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) колющего урона.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) колющего урона.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов или дальность 30/120 футов, одна цель. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) колющего урона.

action.name: Spit Fire {@recharge 6}
entries: The dracotaur spits fire at a point within 30 feet of it. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: Сфинкс невосприимчив к любым эффектам, которые могут почувствовать его эмоции или прочитать его мысли, а также к любым заклинаниям гадания, которые он отвергает. Проверки мудрости ({@skill Insight}), сделанные для выяснения намерений или искренности сфинкса, имеют недостаток.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Атаки оружием сфинкса являются магическими.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Сфинкс наносит одну атаку укусом и две атаки когтями. Если обе атаки когтями попадают в одну цель, цель получает дополнительные 4 ({@damage 1d8}) колющих повреждений.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The sphinx exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 14d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Displacement (Recharges after the Sphinx Casts an Illusion Spell of 1st Level or Higher*)
entries: The sphinx projects an illusion that makes the sphinx appear to be standing in a place a few inches from its actual location, causing any creature to have disadvantage on attack rolls against the sphinx. The effect ends if the sphinx takes damage, it is {@condition incapacitated}, or its speed becomes 0.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sphinx casts one of the following spells using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: Сфинкс делает одну атаку когтями.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Сфинкс использует заклинание.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the doom blossom remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a Large normal flower plant.

trait.name: Rooted
entries: The doom blossom has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would pull, push, or knock it prone.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The doom b;ossom uses Doom Pheromones, if available. It then makes four melee attacks, any number of which can be Bite or Root Tendril attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}) and pulled 5 feet toward the doom blossom. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and doom blossom can automatically hit the target with its root tendril. The doom blossom has 6 root tendrils, each of which can only grapple one target.

Each root tendril can be attacked (AC 10; 10 hit points; immunity to psychic damage). Destroying a root tendril deals no damage to the doom blossom, which can use an action to grow a replacement root tendril.

action.name: Pheromones (1/Day)
entries: The doom blossom releases pheromones in a 60footradius cloud. The pheromones spread around corners and lingers in the air for 1 minute. Each creature that is completely within the cloud at the start of its turn must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw against poison. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} until the start of its next turn. While {@condition charmed}, the creature tries to get as close to the doom blossom as possible, using its actions to {@action Dash} until it is within 5 feet of the doom blossom.
Умеренный ветер (не менее 10 миль в час) рассеивает облако после 4 раундов. Сильный ветер (не менее 20 миль в час) рассеивает его после 1 раунда.

monster.name: Diwata

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the diwata fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The diwata has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Plant Camouflage
entries: The diwata has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The diwata regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it is within 120 feet of its grove. If the diwata takes fire or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the diwata's next turn. The diwata's body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Speak With Beasts And Plants
entries: The diwata can communicate with beasts and plants as if they and the diwata shared a language.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the diwata casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The diwata can use its Pacifying Presence. It then makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the diwata until the end of the diwata's next turn.

action.name: Pacifying Presence
entries: Each creature of the diwata's choice that the diwata can see within 120 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw, or else the target drops any weapons it is holding, ends its concentration on any spells or other effects, and becomes {@condition charmed} by the diwata for 1 minute. The {@condition charmed} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the diwata's Pacifying Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The diwata magically polymorphs into a Medium-sized humanoid. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The diwata casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks):

legendaryHeader: The diwata gains 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The diwata regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The diwata moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Slam
entries: The diwata makes a Slam attack.

legendary.name: Cast Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The diwata uses Spellcasting.

legendary.name: Expel (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature the diwata can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or be teleported to an unoccupied space within 240 feet of the diwata. That space must be on the ground or on a floor.

monster.name: Demonflesh Golem

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 90 hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: Голем невосприимчив к любому заклинанию или эффекту, который изменит его форму.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Голем имеет преимущество в бросках спасения против заклинаний и других магических эффектов.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Оружейные атаки голема являются магическими.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem uses its Terrifying Gaze. It then makes three attacks: one with its Bite, one with its Claw, and one with its Pincer.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit. 32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or be cursed for 1 minute. While cursed, a creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against the golem. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}).

action.name: Terrifying Gaze
entries: The golem turns its magical gaze toward one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the golem for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature is {@condition paralyzed}. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to golem's Terrifying Gaze for the next 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The golem casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}):

trait.name: Appendages
entries: The deepspawn can have up to six appendages. Three of the appendages are tentacles and the other three are serpentlike limbs. One of the tentacles is used to wield a weapon. Each appendage can be attacked (AC 16; 50 hit points; immunity to psychic damage). Destroying an appendage deals no damage to the deepspawn, which can regrow a replacement appendage by using its lair action.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the deepspawn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The deepspawn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deepspawn makes three melee attacks. one with its Bite, one with its Tentacle, and one with its Battleaxe. It can replace two of its melee attacks with Tentacle Slam or Spawn, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 +7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Huge or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and the deepspawn can automatically hit the target with its tentacle.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tentacle Slam
entries: The deepspawn slams creatures {@condition grappled} by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or take 25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the deepspawn's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

bonus.name: Spawn (1/Day)
entries: The deepspawn produces a spawn, which is a random Huge or smaller creature that is has devoured. The spawn must be a {@filter beast, dragon, fey, giant, humanoid, monstrosity, or plant of CR 6 or less|bestiary|type=beast;dragon;fey;giant;humanoid;monstrosity;plant|challenge rating=[&0;&6]|miscellaneous=!swarm}. The spawn is a direct copy of the creature devoured by the deepspawn, and retains learned abilities as well as some dim recollection of its former existence. Once the deepspawn has spawned a specific creature it has devoured, it cannot spawn that creature again. The spawn appears in the nearest space within 5 feet of the deepspawn and acts as its ally. The spawn acts one turn after the deepspawn on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. The spawn is completely loyal and dedicated to the deepspawn and cannot be forced to attack the deepspawn by any means.

reaction.name: Protective Spawn
entries: When the deepspawn is hit by an attack, one spawn within 5 feet of the deepspawn must use its reaction to be hit by the attack instead.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The deepspawn casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}):

legendary.name: Move
entries: The deepspawn moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: The deepspawn makes a Bite attack.

legendary.name: Tentacle
entries: The deepspawn makes a Tentacle attack.

legendary.name: Bludgeon (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The deepspawn uses Tentacle Slam.

legendary.name: Hold Monster (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The deepspawn casts {@spell Hold Monster}.

trait.name: Appendages
entries: The deepspawn can have up to six appendages. Three of the appendages are tentacles and the other three are serpentlike limbs. One of the tentacles is used to wield a weapon. Each appendage can be attacked (AC 16; 50 hit points; immunity to psychic damage). Destroying an appendage deals no damage to the deepspawn, which can regrow a replacement appendage by using its lair action.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the deepspawn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The deepspawn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deepspawn makes three melee attacks. one with its Bite, one with its Tentacle, and one with its Battleaxe. It can replace two of its melee attacks with Tentacle Slam or Spawn, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 +5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and the deepspawn can automatically hit the target with its tentacle. The deepspawn has two tentacles, each of which can grapple only one target.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tentacle Slam
entries: The deepspawn slams creatures grappled by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the deepspawn's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

bonus.name: Spawn (1/Day)
entries: The deepspawn produces a spawn, which is a random Large or smaller creature that is has devoured. The spawn must be a {@filter beast, dragon, fey, giant, humanoid, monstrosity, or plant of CR 3 or less|bestiary|type=beast;dragon;fey;giant;humanoid;monstrosity;plant|challenge rating=[&0;&6]|miscellaneous=!swarm}. The spawn is a direct copy of the creature devoured by the deepspawn, and retains learned abilities as well as some dim recollection of its former existence. Once the deepspawn has spawned a specific creature it has devoured, it cannot spawn that creature again. The spawn appears in the nearest space within 5 feet of the deepspawn and acts as its ally. The spawn acts one turn after the deepspawn on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. The spawn is completely loyal and dedicated to the deepspawn and cannot be forced to attack the deepspawn by any means.

reaction.name: Protective Spawn
entries: When the deepspawn is hit by an attack, one spawn within 5 feet of the deepspawn must use its reaction to be hit by the attack instead.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The deepspawn casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

legendary.name: Move
entries: The deepspawn moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: The deepspawn makes a Bite attack.

legendary.name: Tentacle
entries: The deepspawn makes a Tentacle attack.

legendary.name: Bludgeon (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The deepspawn uses Tentacle Slam.

legendary.name: Hold Monster (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The deepspawn casts Hold Monster.

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: The naga is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks made to ascertain the naga's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: Если нага умирает, она возвращается к жизни через {@dice 1d6} дней и восстанавливает все свои хит-пойнты. Только заклинание {@spell wish} может помешать действию этой черты.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The naga makes two melee attacks: one with its Bite and one with its Sting.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition unconscious} and is in a nightmare-haunted sleep. An {@condition unconscious} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the {@condition unconscious} creature takes damage, or someone uses an action to shake or slap it awake, it gains advantage on its saving throw. A creature that awakens from this effect becomes {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The naga has 7 sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points to gain one of the following benefits:

items.name: Heightened Spell:
items.entry: When the naga casts a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw to resist the spell's effects, the naga can spend 3 sorcery points to give one target of the spell disadvantage on its first saving throw against the spell.

items.name: Quickened Spell:
items.entry: When the naga casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, the naga can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The naga casts one of the following spells, requiring only verbal components and Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):
footerEntries: {@i * The dark naga casts this spell before combat.}

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Дувенде имеет преимущество в бросках спасения против заклинаний и других магических эффектов.

trait.name: Speak With Beasts And Plants
entries: Дувенде могут общаться со зверями и растениями, как будто у них с анито общий язык.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Superior Invisibility
entries: Дувенд магически становится невидимым, пока не закончится его концентрация (как при концентрации на заклинании). Любое снаряжение, которое носит или несет дувенд, становится невидимым вместе с ним.

reaction.name: Bestow Misfortune (3/Day)
entries: When a creature the duwende can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, the duwende rolls a {@dice d10} and deducts it from the result. The duwende can make this choice after the roll is made but before the outcome is determined.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Дувенд произносит одно из следующих заклинаний, не требующих материальных компонентов и использующих харизму в качестве способности к заклинанию (спасение от заклинания {@dc 12}):

trait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: The cult leader has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the cult leader fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cult leader makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protective Thrall
entries: When the cult leader is hit by an attack, one ally within 5 feet of the cult leader must use its reaction to be hit by the attack instead.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cult leader casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Beguile
entries: The cult leader targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the cult leader, the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The cult leader casts {@spell sacred flame} or {@spell toll the dead|XGE}.

legendary.name: Dark Exhortation (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The cult leader targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the cult leader, the target can use its reaction to move up to half its speed and make one melee weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The sphinx can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: Сфинкс невосприимчив к любым эффектам, которые могут почувствовать его эмоции или прочитать его мысли, а также к любым заклинаниям гадания, которые он отвергает. Проверки мудрости ({@skill Insight}), сделанные для выяснения намерений или искренности сфинкса, имеют недостаток.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Атаки оружием сфинкса являются магическими.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sphinx makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks. If both Claw attacks hit the same target, the target takes an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage. It can use Death Roll in place of its Bite attack, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, the sphinx can automatically hit the target with its bite, and the sphinx can't bite another target.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Death Roll {@recharge 5}
entries: While the sphinx is underwater, a creature the sphinx is grappling must make a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 31 ({@damage 4d12 + 5}) slashing damage and is {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

action.name: Hiss and Bellow (2/Day)
entries: The sphinx emits a magical hiss or bellow. The first time it uses this feature before finishing a long rest, the sphinx uses Hiss. The second time it uses this feature before finishing a long rest, it uses Bellow. Each creature within 60 feet of the sphinx and able to hear the Sphinx must make a saving throw.

action.name: Hiss
entries: Each creature that fails a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Bellow
entries: Each creature that fails a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature is knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition stunned} and can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: Сфинкс делает одну атаку когтями.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Сфинкс магически телепортируется вместе со всем снаряжением, которое он носит или несет, на расстояние до 60 футов в незанятое пространство, которое он может видеть.

legendary.name: Raking Pounce (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Сфинкс двигается с максимальной скоростью и наносит две атаки когтями. Если обе атаки когтями попадают в одну цель, цель получает дополнительные 4 ({@damage 1d8}) колющих повреждений.

trait.name: Corpses
entries: When first encountered, a corpse flower contains the corpses of {@dice 2d6 + 6} humanoids. A corpse flower can hold the remains of up to eighteen dead humanoids. These remains have total cover against attacks and other effects outside the corpse flower. If the corpse flower dies, the corpses within it can be pulled free.
While it has at least one humanoid corpse in its body, the corpse flower can use a bonus action to do one of the following:

items: The corpse flower digests two humanoid corpse in its body and instantly regains 22 ({@damage 4d10}) hit points. Nothing of the digested body remains. Any equipment on the corpse is expelled from the corpse flower in its space.

The corpse flower animates two dead humanoids in its body, turning them into {@creature zombie|MM|zombies}. The zombies appear in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the corpse flower and act immediately after it in the initiative order. The zombies act as allies of the corpse flower but aren't under its control, and the flower's stench clings to the zombies (see the Stench of Death trait).

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The corpse flower can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Stench of Death
entries: Each creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the corpse flower or one of its zombies must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, unless the creature is a construct or undead. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of the turn. Creatures that are immune to poison damage or the {@condition poisoned} condition automatically succeed on this saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is immune to the stench of all corpse flowers for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The corpse flower makes three Tentacle attacks and uses Harvest the Dead, if applicable.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Harvest the Dead
entries: The corpse flower grabs one unsecured dead humanoid within 10 feet of it and stuffs the corpse into itself, along with any equipment the corpse is wearing or carrying. The remains can be used with the Corpses trait.

action.name: Corpse Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The corpse flower consumes up to four humanoid corpses and discharges a powerful jet of putrefied liquid body remains and bones in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage for each corpse consumed by the corpse flower and the target is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of the corpse flower's next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The giant has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: Если великан провалил бросок спасения, он может выбрать вместо него успех.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two attacks with its Morningstar.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} +13 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Cloak of Shadows (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The giant creates a perfect illusion of itself that lasts for 1 minute, or until the giant loses its concentration (as if it was concentrating on a spell). The illusion appears in an unoccupied space that the giant can see within 30 feet of it. As a bonus action on its turn, it can move the illusion up to 30 feet to a space it can see, but it must remain within 120 feet of it.

For the duration, the giant can cast spells as though it was in the illusion's space, but it must use its own senses. Additionally, when both the giant and its illusion are within 5 feet of a creature that can see the illusion, the giant has advantage on attack rolls against that creature, given how distracting the illusion is to the target.

reaction.name: Mirror Spell (3/Day)
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the giant casts a spell, and the giant can see and hear the creature, the giant temporarily gains knowledge of the spell if it is at least 1st level and not higher than 4th level and takes only 1 action to cast. The giant knows the spell this turn only and casts it immediately as an innate spellcasting ability.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The giant casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}):

legendary.name: Move
entries: Гигант перемещается на половину своей скорости.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Гигант совершает атаку ближнего или дальнего боя.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The giant uses Spellcasting.

monster.name: Clockwork Golem

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the golem's hit points reaches 0, it explodes in a burst of shrapnel and scalding steam. Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: Голем невосприимчив к любому заклинанию или эффекту, который изменит его форму.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Голем имеет преимущество в бросках спасения против заклинаний и других магических эффектов.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Оружейные атаки голема являются магическими.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Голем делает две атаки Slam.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Arcane Cannon {@recharge 4}
entries: The golem fires a magical projectile from its shoulder-mounted cannon at a point within 120 feet of it. The golem chooses the effect from the following options:

items.name: 1. Fire Projectile (1/Day).
entries: Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 22 ({@damage 5d8}) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.

items.name: 2. Frost Projectile (1/Day).
entries: Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage and suffers 2 levels of {@condition exhaustion}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.

items.name: 3. Lightning Projectile (1/Day).
entries: Each creature in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) lightning damage and is {@condition incapacitated} for 1 minute. An {@condition incapacitated} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Steam Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The golem jets scalding steam from its arm-mounted twin barrels in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.

bonus.name: Retracting Arm
entries: The golem extends the reach of its next Slam attack this turn to 20 feet. If the attack hits and the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and pulled 15 feet toward the golem. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}.

bonus.name: Steam-Powered Rocket Jump {@recharge 5}
entries: The golem gains a fly speed of 40 until the end of the turn.

monster.name: Clockwork Beholder

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the clockwork beholder's hit points reaches 0, roll {@dice 1d6}. On a roll of 3 or higher, it explodes in a burst of shrapnel and scalding steam. Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Spell Redirection Cone
entries: The clockwork beholder's central eye creates an area of spell redirection, in a 150-foot cone. If a creature within the cone targets the clockwork beholder with a spell or spell attack, the beholder causes that spell to hit another creature of its choice within 60 feet of it that it can see. At the start of each of its turns, the clockwork beholder decides which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The clockwork beholder has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 3d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Eye Rays
entries: The clockwork beholder shoots three of the following magical eye rays at {@dice 1d10|random} (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets it can see within 120 feet of it:

items.name: 1. Fire Ray
items.entry: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.

items.name: 2. Freeze Ray
items.entry: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage and the target can't use reactions and its speed is halved for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 3. Lightning Ray
items.entry: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) lightning damage and the target is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of the clockwork beholder's next turn.

items.name: 4. Acid Ray
items.entry: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) acid damage immediately and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.

items.name: 5. Poison Ray
items.entry: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A {@condition poisoned} creature is {@condition paralyzed}. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 6. Radiant Ray
items.entry: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage and the target is {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 7. Force Ray
items.entry: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage and the target is pushed up to 10 feet directly away from the clockwork beholder and is knocked {@condition prone}.

items.name: 8. Antimagic Ray
items.entry: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or the target is affected as if in an antimagic field spell for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 9. Death Ray
items.entry: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 33 ({@damage 6d10}) necrotic damage. The target dies if the ray reduces it to 0 hit points.

items.name: 10. Malfunctioning Ray
items.entry: The eye activates, sputters, blows a gasket, and does nothing.

reaction.name: Direct Spell Redirection Cone
entries: When a creature the clockwork beholder can see targets the clockwork beholder with a spell or spell attack and the creature is within 150 feet of the clockwork beholder, the clockwork beholder activates its spell redirection cone and faces in the direction of the creature.

legendaryHeader: The clockwork beholder can take 3 legendary actions, using the Eye Ray option below. It can take only one legendary action at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The clockwork beholder regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Eye Ray
entries: The clockwork beholder uses one random eye ray.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the champion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The champion's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Superior Critical
entries: The champion's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The champion makes three attacks with its Greatsword or its Shortbow.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

bonus.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The champion can regain 25 hit points.

legendary.name: Charge
entries: The champion moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Intimidating Presence
entries: The champion targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the champion, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the champion for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to champion's Intimidating Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Greatsword (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The champion attacks with its Greatsword.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the cervidal moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a Ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 ({@damage 2d4}) damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The cervidal has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Speak With Beasts
entries: The cervidal can communicate with beasts as if they shared a language.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cervidal makes three attacks. one to Ram and two with its Rapier.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dispelling Horns (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action when the cervidal hits a target with a Ram attack, it can choose one of three effects:

action.name: Break Enchantment
entries: If the target that is {@condition charmed}, frightened, or possessed by a celestial, an elemental, a fey, a fiend, or an undead, the target hit is no longer charmed, frightened, or possessed by such creatures.

action.name: Dismissal
entries: If the target is an illusion, it is immediately dispelled. If the target is a a fey, a fiend, or an undead, the cervidal can attempt to drive the creature back to its home plane. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw or be sent back to its home plane (if it isn't there already). If they aren't on their home plane, undead are sent to the Shadowfell, and fey are sent to the Feywild.

action.name: Dispel Magic
entries: Any spell of 3rd level or lower on the target ends. For each spell of 4th level or higher on the target, the cervidal must make a Charisma ability check. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a successful check, the spell ends.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cervidal casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
entries: Сфинкс имеет преимущество при проверках мудрости ({@skill Perception}), которые полагаются на слух или обоняние.

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: Сфинкс невосприимчив к любым эффектам, которые могут почувствовать его эмоции или прочитать его мысли, а также к любым заклинаниям гадания, которые он отвергает. Проверки мудрости ({@skill Insight}), сделанные для выяснения намерений или искренности сфинкса, имеют недостаток.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Атаки оружием сфинкса являются магическими.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Сфинкс наносит одну атаку укусом и две атаки когтями. Если обе атаки когтями попадают в одну цель, цель получает дополнительные 4 ({@damage 1d8}) колющих повреждений.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) косой урон.

action.name: Howl (2/Day)
entries: The sphinx emits a magical howl. Each time it howls before finishing a long rest, the howl becomes more potent, as detailed below. Each creature within 200 feet of the sphinx and able to hear the howl must make a saving throw.

action.name: First Howl
entries: Each enemy creature that fails a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Second Howl
entries: Each enemy creature that fails a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature is {@condition paralyzed} and can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: Сфинкс делает одну атаку когтями.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Сфинкс магически телепортируется вместе со всем снаряжением, которое он носит или несет, на расстояние до 60 футов в незанятое пространство, которое он может видеть.

legendary.name: Raking Pounce (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Сфинкс двигается с максимальной скоростью и наносит две атаки когтями. Если обе атаки когтями попадают в одну цель, цель получает дополнительные 4 ({@damage 1d8}) колющих повреждений.

trait.name: Brave
entries: The cambion has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the cambion hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Fiendish Blessing
entries: The AC of the cambion includes its Charisma bonus (included in the AC).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cambion makes three melee attacks. two with its Warhammer and one with its Sting; or uses its Fire Ray twice.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, or 16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Fire Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Fiendish Charm
entries: One humanoid the cambion can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed for 1 day. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the cambion's spoken commands. If the target suffers any harm from the cambion or another creature or receives a suicidal command from the cambion, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the cambion's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Weighted Net
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, ranged 20/60 ft., one Small or Medium creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} until it escapes the net. Any creature can use its action to make a {@dc 15} Strength check to free itself or another creature in the net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 10 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) destroys the net and frees the target.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cambion casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

trait.name: Unnerving Chatter (Fiend Form Only)
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of at least 3 busos that aren't incapacitated and can hear the busos must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the busos for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the buso's Unnerving Chatter for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
entries: The buso has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: At night, the buso can use its action to polymorph into its Fiend Form or back into its true form, which is humanoid. In Fiend Form, the buso appears as a ghoul-like humanoid. Its statistics, other than its Speed, damage, and damage resistances, are the same in each form. It reverts to its true form at dawn or if it dies. While transformed, the buso also gains the following features:

items: The buso's creature type changes to fiend.
The buso has advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks and Strength and Dexterity saving throws.
When it makes a melee weapon attack, the buso gains a {@hit 3} bonus to the damage roll (included in the attack).
The buso can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
If the buso starts its turn within 10 feet of a pound of salt or garlic, it becomes {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The buso makes one attack with its Dagger (humanoid form) or two attacks. one with its Bite and one with its Claws (fiend form).

action.name: Bite (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage, and the buso gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.

action.name: Claws (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} для попадания, досягаемость 5 футов, одно существо. Попадание: 10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) косых повреждений.

action.name: Dagger (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов или дальность 20/60 футов, одна цель. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) колющего урона.

action.name: Shadow Step (Fiend Form Only)
entries: As a bonus action while in dim light or darkness, the buso teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is also in dim light or darkness. It then has advantage on the first melee attack it makes before the end of the turn.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the bungisngis moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a Tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Horrid Giggling
entries: The bungisngis incessantly emits a magical, infectious giggling sound. When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the bungisngis and is able to hear the bungisngis, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw, unless the bungisngis is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the target is {@condition charmed} until the start of its next turn or until it takes damage. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the target falls {@condition prone} and starts giggling uncontrollably, becoming incapacitated and unable to stand up. A creature with an Intelligence score of 4 or less isn't affected.
If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the bungisngis's Horrid Giggling for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Poor Depth Perception
entries: The bungisngis has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The bungisngis has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bungisngis makes three attacks. one with its Tusk and two with its Claws.

entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Claw

action.name: Rock

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The bullywug can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Speak With Frogs And Toads
entries: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: The bullywug has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bullywug makes two melee attacks. one with its Bite and one with its Spear.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} попадание, радиус действия 5 футов, одна цель. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) колющего урона.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Breath of Ramenos {@recharge 5}
entries: The bullywug exhales inebriating toxic gas in a 15-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A target acts as if subjected to the {@spell confusion} spell while {@condition poisoned} this way. A {@condition poisoned} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

entries: The bullywug targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the bullywug, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or to take the {@action Dodge} or {@action Hide} action.

Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the bullywug can't use its bite or tongue attack on another target.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage, and the target must make a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is pulled to a space within 5 feet of the bullywug, which can use a bonus action to make a Bite attack against the target.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The bullywug makes a Bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the bullywug, and it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the bullywug's turns.

The bullywug can have only one creature swallowed at a time. If the bullywug takes 10 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the bullywug must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the swallowed creature, which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 5 feet of the bullywug. If the bullywug dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Stunning Croak {@recharge 5}
entries: The bullywug emits a magical stupefying croak. Each creature not a bullywug within 20 feet of the bullywug and can hear the bullywug must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A {@condition stunned} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries: The bullywug moves up to its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}. The bullywug can move through Large or smaller creatures and objects during this movement but can't end its turn inside a creature's or object's space.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d12 + 3}) slashing damage, or 18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) slashing damage while raging.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} попадание, дальность 150/600 футов, одно существо. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) колющего урона.

bonus.name: Rage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The bugbear enters a rage. The rage lasts for 1 minute or until the bugbear is {@condition incapacitated}. While raging, the bugbear gains the following benefits:

items: The bugbear has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
When it makes a melee weapon attack, the bugbear gains a {@hit 2} bonus to the damage roll (included in the attack.
The bugbear has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the bugbear fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bugbear uses Maneuver Allies, if available. It then makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Shield Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a creature it must make a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} попадание, дальность 150/600 футов, одно существо. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) колющего урона.

action.name: Maneuver Allies {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to three beast allies within 60 feet of this bugbear that can hear it each use their reaction to move up to half their speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

action.name: Summon Beast (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The bugbear summons {@dice 2d4} {@creature giant rat|MM|giant rats}, {@dice 1d4+1} {@creature wolf|MM|wolves}, {@dice 1d2} {@creature worg|MM|worgs}, or 1 {@creature dire wolf}. The beasts appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the bugbear and acts as its allies. The beasts act right after the bugbear on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They remain for 1 hour, until they or the bugbear dies, or until the bugbear dismisses them as an action.

reaction.name: Protective Beast
entries: When the bugbear is hit by an attack, one allied beast within 5 feet of the bugbear must use its reaction to be hit by the attack instead.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The bugbear casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as its spellcasting ability:

legendary.name: Move
entries: The bugbear moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Shield Slam
entries: The bugbear makes a shield slam attack.

legendary.name: Command Beast
entries: The bugbear targets one allied beast it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the bugbear, the target can use its reaction to make one weapon attack or move up to its speed.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The bugbear attacks with its battleaxe or longbow.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: Дракон может задерживать дыхание на 15 минут или пока не использует кислотное дыхание.

trait.name: Sand Camouflage
entries: Дракон имеет преимущество при проверке ловкости ({@skill Stealth}), чтобы спрятаться в песчаной местности.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales corrosive sand in a 15-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) acid damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: Если нага умирает, она возвращается к жизни через {@dice 1d6} дней и восстанавливает все свои хит-пойнты. Только заклинание {@spell wish} может помешать действию этой черты.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage., and the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Shining Scales {@recharge 5}
entries: The naga's golden scales emit a dazzling flash of light. Each creature within 30 feet of the naga and can see the naga must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The naga casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bladesinger makes two Shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Bladesong (3/Day)
entries: The bladesinger starts Bladesong, which lasts for 1 minute. It ends early if the bladesinger is {@condition incapacitated}, dons medium or heavy armor or a shield, or if it uses two hands to make an attack with a weapon. It can also dismiss the Bladesong at any time (no action required). While the Bladesong is active, the bladesinger gains the following benefits:

items: +3 bonus to its AC
walking speed increases by 10 feet
advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) checks
+3 bonus to any Constitution saving throw it makes to maintain concentration on a spell

reaction.name: Song of Defense
entries: When the bladesinger takes damage, it can expend one spell slot and reduce that damage by an amount equal to five times the spell slot's level.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The bladesinger casts one of the following spells using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):
footerEntries: {@i *The bladesinger casts this spell on itself before combat.}

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the blackguard fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The blackguard's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The blackguard makes three attacks with its Longsword or its Shortbow.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Dreadful Aspect (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The blackguard exudes magical menace. Each enemy within 30 feet of the blackguard must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. If a {@condition frightened} target ends its turn more than 30 feet away from the blackguard, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Summon Fiend (1/Day)
entries: The blackguard summons a barbed devil, barlgura, or mezzoloth. A summoned fiend appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the blackguard and acts as an ally of the blackguard. It remains for an hour, until it or the blackguard dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The blackguard casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Charge
entries: The blackguard moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The blackguard makes a melee or ranged weapon attack.

legendary.name: Command Fiend
entries: The blackguard targets an allied fiend it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the blackguard, the target can use its reaction to make one melee weapon attack or move up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The blackguard uses Spellcasting.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The hag has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Loathsome Presence
entries: Any humanoid that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hag and can smell the hag must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature spends its action that turn retching and reeling. Humanoids that don't need to breathe or are immune to poison automatically succeed on this saving throw. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the hag's Loathsome Presence for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Aswang Curse (1/Day)
entries: A hag can curse an {@condition incapacitated} humanoid. The hag has to be within 5 feet of the humanoid for at least 5 minutes, after which it expels a shadowy essence from its mouth and transfers it into the target's, afflicting it with the {@creature buso|MonsterManualExpanded3} aswang curse. The {@creature buso|MonsterManualExpanded3} acts as the hag's ally. Casting {@spell remove curse}, {@spell greater restoration}, or a similar spell on the target can end the curse. Doing so undoes the changes made to the target by the curse.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag makes two attacks. one with its Claws and one with its Tongue.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

action.name: Haunting Wail {@recharge 6}
entries: The hag emits a terrifying wail that frightens foes and incites its undead allies into a frenzy. Each undead ally that is within 60 feet of the hag, can hear the hag, and not already affected by Haunting Wail gain advantage on attack rolls and saving throw rolls until the start of the hag's next turn. All other non-undead and non-fiend creatures within 60 feet of the hag must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature must take the {@action Dash} action and move away from the hag by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the {@action Dash} action. If the creature ends its turn in a location where it doesn't have line of sight to the hag, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the hag's Haunting Wail for the next 24 hours.

The {@creature buso|MonsterManualExpanded3} acts as the hag's ally. Casting {@spell remove curse}, {@spell greater restoration}, or a similar spell on the target can end the curse. entries: The bard targets one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the bard, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of the bard's next turn.

entries: The bard moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

entries: The bard casts {@spell vicious mockery}.

legendary.name: Attack
